# miniRSA

## Problem

Lets decrypt this: [ciphertext](https://2019shell1.picoctf.com/static/3eb9d14faaddf76a89dae172e58334d8/ciphertext)? Something seems a bit small

### Ciphertext

```
N: 
e: 3

ciphertext (c): 2205316413931134031074603746928247799030155221252519872649611751702430439402967052009248250289961880642561508086676942304787433622315744241706664042782734376502484888131147533970136649038736862434581066144482993850305122145625013872515429 
```

## Solution

In Python:

```
import gmpy2
n = 
n=hex(n)
e = 3
cipher = 2205316413931134031074603746928247799030155221252519872649611751702430439402967052009248250289961880642561508086676942304787433622315744241706664042782734376502484888131147533970136649038736862434581066144482993850305122145625013872515429

with gmpy2.local_context(gmpy2.context(), precision=800) as ctx:
    ctx.precision += 800
    root = gmpy2.cbrt(cipher)

print(str('%x' % + int(root)).decode('hex'))
```

**Flag: picoCTF{n33d_a_lArg3r_e_21d2334d}**
